You are protected from other sources of fire. You have insomnia, and cannot easily go to sleep. (insomnia) You are insulated against the harsh cold. (caloric) You are feeling extremely energetic. (i) H:3975/3975 M:3750/3750 E:100% W:100% B:100 X:91% csdb<eb>> < 17:53:02:218 > Benedicto tells you, "Yupski." who benedicto H:3975/3975 M:3750/3750 E:100% W:100% B:100 X:91% csdb<eb>> < 17:53:03:125 > ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Benedicto - Nearing a bubbling brook (8059) - Lleisian Forest. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- There are 3 players on this plane and 96 players on other planes. l H:3975/3975 M:3750/3750 E:100% W:100% B:100 X:91% csdb<eb>> < 17:53:05:500 > At the base of the Lleisian Tree. (Lleisian Forest.) Surrounded by the overgrown stone ruins of ancient architecture, the great Lleisian Tree towers overhead in all its natural glory. A huge oak tree of mammoth proportions, the Lleisian Tree is a testament to the strength of nature in the face of time and its ravages. The tree stands tall and strong in the midst of the ruins of what looks to have been a spacious, circular room. The remains of a border show through in between the surface roots, as if this tree had been the centerpiece of the room, only to have outgrown its boundaries over time. The tree's branches start rather low to the ground, and continue up its trunk in a random, but almost ladder-like fashion, allowing even the most novice of treeclimbers easy access to the top. Cradled in the Lleisian Tree's upper branches is what looks to be a dark obelisk, extending down at an angle toward a spot in the northeast. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. You see exits leading east, southwest, northwest and up. H:3975/3975 M:3367/3750 E:96% W:98% B:100 X:91% csdb<eb>> < 17:57:03:171 > l H:3975/3975 M:3367/3750 E:96% W:98% B:100 X:91% csdb<eb>> < 17:57:03:218 > Nearing a bubbling brook. (lost) (Lleisian Forest.) This area is unnaturally flooded with water. Greeted by the sounds of a bubbling stream and a small flowing waterfall, a feeling of peace pervades the area. Beautiful orchids sway in the gentle passing breeze, seemingly keeping a watch over the various fish that lazily propel themselves through the stream. A giant oak tree towers over you here, dividing whatever light the sky may give into even rays that sit comfortably, unmoving on the small grassy knolls that surround you. An icewall is here, blocking passage to the east. An icewall is here, blocking passage to the west. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. You see exits leading east and west. (Enorian.) [-Dhar-] The air shimmers between two huge pyramidal menhirs that mark the portal beckoning the way into the arena below. Scenes depicting heroic combatants are etched deeply into each of the four sides of the pillars, signifying great battles of the past and those yet to come. The earth is well trodden, having been packed hard by the numerous accomplished combatants, as well as those amateur to the combative arts. Evidence of foot traffic is everywhere - the grass is trampled, sword lashes scar the earth, and black scorch marks are reminiscent of the power of those who wield fire. Curiously, the ground beyond the coruscating portal remains untouched by the regular skirmishes. A flame-charred chariot pulled by demonic goats stands here. A bright-eyed missionary serenely patrols the streets of Enorian. A stout donkey stands patiently by, waiting for a burden. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. You are protected by 29 defences. l H:3975/3975 M:3750/3750 E:100% W:100% B:100 X:91% csdb<eb>> < 18:00:47:765 > At the base of the Lleisian Tree. (Lleisian Forest.) Surrounded by the overgrown stone ruins of ancient architecture, the great Lleisian Tree towers overhead in all its natural glory. A huge oak tree of mammoth proportions, the Lleisian Tree is a testament to the strength of nature in the face of time and its ravages. The tree stands tall and strong in the midst of the ruins of what looks to have been a spacious, circular room. The remains of a border show through in between the surface roots, as if this tree had been the centerpiece of the room, only to have outgrown its boundaries over time. The tree's branches start rather low to the ground, and continue up its trunk in a random, but almost ladder-like fashion, allowing even the most novice of treeclimbers easy access to the top. Cradled in the Lleisian Tree's upper branches is what looks to be a dark obelisk, extending down at an angle toward a spot in the northeast. A stout donkey stands patiently by, waiting for a burden. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. You see exits leading east, southwest, northwest and up. (skullcap) You nod gravely at your Guardian Angel, whose wings flare suddenly as an alien and frightening look of power sweeps across her face. With one hand, she reaches forward and as her hand touches Benedicto's chest, it flares brightly, impossibly, white, and enters his breast. The Angel's eyes roll back in its head in ecstasy as she rips the soul from Benedicto's body. Benedicto collapses without a sound; his body now nothing more than a useless husk.
